mapper.select: select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, A.* from (select * from PASSBOARD order by pass_seq desc) A, (select @rownum:=0) R) B where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into PASSBOARD(pass_title, pass_company, pass_career, pass_job, pass_univ, pass_grade, pass_toeic, pass_content) values(#{pass_title},#{pass_company},#{pass_career},#{pass_job},#{pass_univ},#{pass_grade},#{pass_toeic},#{pass_content})
mapper.update: update PASSBOARD set pass_title=#{pass_title}, pass_company=#{pass_company}, pass_career=#{pass_career}, pass_job=#{pass_job}, pass_univ=#{pass_univ}, pass_grade=#{pass_grade}, pass_toeic=#{pass_toeic}, pass_content=#{pass_content}where pass_seq=#{pass_seq}
